author: Andrew S
comment: After payment and reboots watch still asks for premium payment. This has been commented by others. Weather also always does location cannot be detected event if set manually. If i set secondary time zone only that gets displayed and can't find how you toggle between primary and secondary time zones. If i could if get refund but unable to via play store.

author: Allan Strydom
comment: So far this is awesome. There are 2 small things annoying me: 1. If you've paid for Premium it should remove the "Obtain Premium Access" option from the menu on the watch completely. It must go away. 2. For some reason the weather widget on the watch won't show the temp, it just draws 2 dashes, even if I set the weather location manually and disable GPS. Other than that, outstanding app.

author: Jessey Clarke
comment: Good app, really like the look and features. Tried others before and some slowed down the watch but happy with this one. Only issue I had was the missed call widget got stuck on 2 missed calls and even after clearing them on phone it wouldn't go back to 0 so had to delete them from call history

author: Brad Aguilar
comment: This watch face is awesome. The only thing is wish I could change the background to a custom picture. Other then that it's perfect still 5 stars all day!

author: Jack Harting
comment: Amazing layout. I love the customization. Couldn't figure out how to fully customize some of the buttons using complication 2.0. Wrote the app developer an email and he responded the next day.

author: Jeff Lubnow
comment: Does just what it says.  Custom widgets and shortcuts make the watch a lot better.  And the designer answered my question. In about FIVE MINUTES.  Can't beat that for service.

author: Bill Gray
comment: I went through the whole setup process on the app on my phone and I have Bluetooth Link up with the watch however I can't seem to install or find it on the watch so what good was paying for premium access?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Did you install it on your watch? You need to accept the installation on the notification on your watch device. If you missed it or dismissed it, please go in the Google Play store on your watch and search for the watch face.

author: Francis Chew
comment: Weather C is not working. None of the app on Top left, right & bottom is not working, not responding when tap. Too small icon u cant see - top left, right, bottom. Translate not working...etc clock face background not function when change, nothing working pay $15++

author: Chris Craver
comment: I'm definitely not a fan of making me purchase an app just to try the full feature give me a couple of days of the full service to see if I liked your application then I'll pay for it if it's worth it....

author: Anthony Giovingo
comment: Keeps resetting itself to 24 hour mode and changing colors by itself. Of course this started happening after I bought the premium version.

author: Gabriel Natanael
comment: I've paid for premium access on my watch before installing the app on my device. Once I realized that I needed the app to fully utilize the watchface, i downloaded the app only to find that I dont have premium access on my phone. Can this be fixed? Thanks

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
the sync of the purchase between watch & mobile takes sometimes time, as it is not sync all the time by the Google Play Services. 
To enforce the refresh of the payment of apps, please try the following to see which one will work:
- Reboot the watch/mobile
- Go in the the Google Play Store on your watch/mobile, in the "my apps" category

author: D. ACO
comment: My step count doesn't refresh! Please fix as this is very frustrating!  Yes I installed Google fit

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you install the Google fit app on your watch as suggested in the settings?

author: Denis Jahnke
comment: Samsung s8 seems to be crashing since I installed and running very hot. Any suggestions?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Please send me an email with some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: ChuckandDave SmithWilson
comment: This is my favorite watch face.  Very easy to read, and the options around the face are very helpful as well.  It's nice to just tap a corner of the watch for a timer or to find my phone, or for flashlight mode.

author: Noam Gonen
comment: Have LG R sport. It slowed the watch to point it was unusable. Garbage.

author: Antoin De Vuono
comment: Haven't had the chance to try it

author: Dare Akintade
comment: Not bad for a watch face, except the price, too expensive

reply.author: thema
reply.content: The premium starts at 1€. Not that expensive don't you think? ;) all the gifts unlock all the features, it's a give what you want

author: Mark David
comment: Looks lovely, but if you want to do anything remotely interesting you have told pay for premium access.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. The main purpose of the free version is to try the design and see if you like it. You can not have every thing for free ;) there is already a lot of options available for free. If it was a paid app you would have nothing for free

author: Ruel Johnson
comment: Attractive face, interactive, and very customizable. However you'll need to pay at least $1.19 the unlock all the features.

author: Brandon Bauman
comment: Best watch app I've used to date! Has the fresh new look I've been looking for, and tons of features!

author: Tiankhy Hinton
comment: Will not download to watch.  I have the LG urbane with Android Wear 2.0.  The only message I get is pending download.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Your Google Play store download stack is broken. Nothing related to my app... cancel the download and reboot your watch and mobile.

author: David Wilkinson
comment: The best watch face I've had. Clear, clean and classy, great widgets/information and customisations.

author: Angel Molines
comment: Good app  Good battery life overall  Missing to see the burned calories in the main screen

author: Roger Pacyga
comment: One of the best apps on my watch. Works flawlessly, paid for premium with no regrets!

author: Chad Budreau
comment: Clean, easy to read, customizable, well worth the price for premium features and to support future work from the developer.

author: Michael Olaworetan
comment: Used to work. After an update now it's asking for premium payment again. I want a full refund.

author: Brian Fuller
comment: Low battery use vs others I've tried. Very clean and quick to see info.

author: AMOL PATEL
comment: Best watch face for android wear 2 i have used till date with lots of customisation...

author: Seven Decker
comment: Works great for my tic watch! Please continue to update customization options!

author: Kuturi Edwards
comment: The customizations on this watch app are great. Feels like a new watch everyday.
I paid for this app and have absolutely no idea how to access it... no directions

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Erick Estrada
comment: Easy to customize, you have endless watches in one, love it

author: John Hume
comment: Very customizable widgets and shortcuts with a slick looking interface.

author: Andrew Lee
comment: My fav watchface this month, love the bee preset
Good watch face. Clean and some to set up

author: Michael P Filicky
comment: Easy to customize watch face and can download more

author: Ples Bruce
comment: Great Face! Exactly what I was looking for.

author: Sal Battaglia
comment: Best watch faces by this app designer!

author: Miles Heywood
comment: Nice watch face runs smoothly

author: Brandon Richards
comment: Love this watch face. Highly customizable. Get it.
